data.text: Ma e wach Jehova Nyasaye mane omiyo Jeremia e wach oro:
“Juda ywak,
Joka ruoth oro jotichgi manyo pi;
Lo nigi okak nikech onge koth e piny;
Kata mwanda manie puodho
Punde mag bungu chungʼ
Kata obedo ni richowa nyisowa ni wan joketho,
Yaye geno mar Israel,
Ere gima omiyo ichalo gi ngʼat mobuok,
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho kuom jogi:
Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachona, “Kik ilam mondo jogi odhi maber.
Kata ka gitweyo chiemo; ok anawinj ywakgi; kata bed ni gichiwo misango miwangʼo pep kod chiwo mag cham, ok anarwakgi. To kata kamano ananeg-gi gi ligangla, kech kod dera.”
To ne awacho niya, “Yaye, Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, jonabi osebedo kanyisogi ni, ‘Ok unune ligangla kata kech bende ok nokau. Adiera, anamiu kwe mochwere kaeni.’ ”

Eka Jehova Nyasaye nowachona, “Jonabigo koro miriambo e nyinga. Pok aorogi, kata walogi kata wuoyo kodgi. Ginyisou fweny manono, gikoro weche manono gilamo nyiseche manono kod pachgi giwegi morundore.
Emomiyo, ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho kuom jonabi makoro e nyinga: Ne ok aorogi, kata bed ni giwacho niya, ‘Onge ligangla kata kech manobi e pinyni.’ Jonabi gogo-go notiek gi ligangla kod kech.
Kendo jogo ma gikorone nowit oko e yore mag Jerusalem nikech kech kod ligangla. Onge ngʼama noikgi kata mondegi, yawuotgi kata nyigi. Anaol kuomgi masiche mowinjore kodgi.
“Wachnegi wachni:
Ka adhi e pinyno,
Bende isekwedo Juda chuth?
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Ne kuom nyingi kik ijarwa;
Bende nyiseche manono maonge
